description: A secret World Government intelligence agency with authorization to kill anyone who opposes the government's will. They specialize in covert operations and assassination, and are trained in the superhuman martial arts style called Rokushiki.

keyMoments.title: CP9 Deduces Franky's Identity
keyMoments.description: Rob Lucci and Kaku work together to deduce and confirm that Franky is actually Cutty Flam, the holder of the Pluton blueprints.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates CP9's investigative abilities and intelligence gathering skills.

keyMoments.title: CP9's True Purpose Revealed
keyMoments.description: Rob Lucci explains that CP9 is a secret assassination unit that doesn't officially exist, with authorization to kill in the name of justice. He reveals they spent five years undercover in Water 7 to obtain the Pluton blueprints.
keyMoments.significance: Exposes CP9's true nature and the World Government's dark intentions regarding ancient weapons.

keyMoments.title: Introduction of Rokushiki
keyMoments.description: Rob Lucci introduces the concept of Rokushiki, explaining that CP9 agents have trained their bodies beyond human limits to master six superhuman martial arts techniques.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the most important combat systems in One Piece, defining CP9's fighting style.

keyMoments.title: CP9 Battles the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: CP9 members engage in combat with the Straw Hat Pirates as Luffy refuses to let Robin leave.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of direct combat between CP9 and the Straw Hats.

episodeActivities.description: CP9 deduces Franky's true identity and confirms he possesses the Pluton blueprints
CP9 engages in combat with the Straw Hat Pirates and Paulie

reveals.information: CP9 is a secret World Government assassination unit with authorization to kill in the name of justice
CP9 spent five years undercover in Water 7 to obtain the Pluton blueprints
CP9 agents are trained in Rokushiki, six superhuman martial arts techniques

goals: Obtain the Pluton blueprints for the World Government
Eliminate anyone who opposes the World Government's will
